title: Ultrahigh Power Generation from Low-Frequency and Micro Motion by Suppressing Air Breakdown
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01119H, Paper
Zeyuan Cao, Junchi Teng, Rong Ding, Jiani Xu, Ren Chao, Seng-Hong Lee, Xingqi Guo, Xiong-Ying Ye
With the development of electrostatic generators, air breakdown has become the main obstacle to further enhancing their output. Utilization of external circuitry to regulate the excited electric field strength in...
